verses.verse: The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>; Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, and Merari <S%H4847><s%>. Gershon: or, Gershom
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>; Amram <S%H6019><s%>, Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, and Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, and Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Amram <S%H6019><s%>; Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and Miriam <S%H4813><s%>. The sons <S%H1121><s%> also of Aaron <S%H175><s%>; Nadab <S%H5070><s%>, and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>.
Eleazar <S%H499><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Phinehas <S%H6372><s%>, Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Abishua <S%H50><s%>,
And Abishua <S%H50><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Bukki <S%H1231><s%>, and Bukki <S%H1231><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>,
And Uzzi <S%H5813><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Zerahiah <S%H2228><s%>, and Zerahiah <S%H2228><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Meraioth <S%H4812><s%>,
Meraioth <S%H4812><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Amariah <S%H568><s%>, and Amariah <S%H568><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Ahitub <S%H285><s%>,
And Ahitub <S%H285><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Zadok <S%H6659><s%>, and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%>,
And Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Azariah <S%H5838><s%>, and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Johanan <S%H3110><s%>,

And Johanan <S%H3110><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Azariah <S%H5838><s%>, (he it is that executed the priest's office <S%H3547><s%> in the temple <S%H1004><s%> that Solomon <S%H8010><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>:) in the temple: Heb. in the house
And Azariah <S%H5838><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Amariah <S%H568><s%>, and Amariah <S%H568><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Ahitub <S%H285><s%>,
And Ahitub <S%H285><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Zadok <S%H6659><s%>, and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Shallum <S%H7967><s%>, Shallum: or, Meshullam
And Shallum <S%H7967><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, and Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Azariah <S%H5838><s%>,
And Azariah <S%H5838><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Seraiah <S%H8304><s%>, and Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jehozadak <S%H3087><s%>,

And Jehozadak <S%H3087><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> into captivity, when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> carried away <S%H1540><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>; Gershom <S%H1647><s%>, Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, and Merari <S%H4847><s%>. Gershom: or, Gershon
And these be the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%>; Libni <S%H3845><s%>, and Shimei <S%H8096><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> were, Amram <S%H6019><s%>, and Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, and Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, and Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>; Mahli <S%H4249><s%>, and Mushi <S%H4187><s%>. And these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>.
Of Gershom <S%H1647><s%>; Libni <S%H3845><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Jahath <S%H3189><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Zimmah <S%H2155><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,

Joah <S%H3098><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Iddo <S%H5714><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Zerah <S%H2226><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Jeaterai <S%H2979><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>. Joah: or, Ethan. ver.2. Iddo: or, Adaiah. ver.41.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>; Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Korah <S%H7141><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Assir <S%H617><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Amminadab: or, Izahar. ver.2.18.
Elkanah <S%H511><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Ebiasaph <S%H43><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Assir <S%H617><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Uriel <S%H222><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah <S%H511><s%>; Amasai <S%H6022><s%>, and Ahimoth <S%H287><s%>.
As for Elkanah <S%H511><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah <S%H511><s%>; Zophai <S%H6689><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Nahath <S%H5184><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Zophai: or, Zuph
Eliab <S%H446><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Jeroham <S%H3395><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Elkanah <S%H511><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Samuel <S%H8050><s%>; the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Vashni <S%H2059><s%>, and Abiah <S%H29><s%>. Vashni: called also Joel
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>; Mahli <S%H4249><s%>, Libni <S%H3845><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Shimei <S%H8096><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Uzza <S%H5798><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Shimea <S%H8092><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Haggiah <S%H2293><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Asaiah <S%H6222><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And these are they whom David <S%H1732><s%> set <S%H5975><s%> over the service <S%H3027><s%> of song <S%H7892><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, after that the ark <S%H727><s%> had rest <S%H4494><s%>.

And they ministered <S%H8334><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the dwelling <S%H4908><s%> place of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> with singing <S%H7892><s%>, until Solomon <S%H8010><s%> had built <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and then they waited <S%H5975><s%> on their office <S%H5656><s%> according to their order <S%H4941><s%>.

And these are they that waited <S%H5975><s%> with their children <S%H1121><s%>. Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>: Heman <S%H1968><s%> a singer <S%H7891><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel <S%H3100><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemuel <S%H8050><s%>, waited: Heb. stood
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah <S%H511><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham <S%H3395><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eliel <S%H447><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Toah <S%H8430><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuph <S%H6689><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah <S%H511><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mahath <S%H4287><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amasai <S%H6022><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah <S%H511><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel <S%H3100><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azariah <S%H5838><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zephaniah <S%H6846><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Tahath <S%H8480><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Assir <S%H617><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebiasaph <S%H43><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And his brother <S%H251><s%> Asaph <S%H623><s%>, who stood <S%H5975><s%> on his right hand <S%H3225><s%>, even Asaph <S%H623><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berachiah <S%H1296><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimea <S%H8092><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael <S%H4317><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baaseiah <S%H1202><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchiah <S%H4441><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Ethni <S%H867><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adaiah <S%H5718><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Ethan <S%H387><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zimmah <S%H2155><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei <S%H8096><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahath <S%H3189><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.

And their brethren <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> stood on the left hand <S%H8040><s%>: Ethan <S%H387><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kishi <S%H7029><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abdi <S%H5660><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malluch <S%H4409><s%>, Kishi: or, Kushaiah
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amaziah <S%H558><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Amzi <S%H557><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani <S%H1137><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shamer <S%H8106><s%>,
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Mahli <S%H4249><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mushi <S%H4187><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.

Their brethren <S%H251><s%> also the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were appointed <S%H5414><s%> unto all manner of service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

But Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> offered <S%H6999><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%>, and were appointed for all the work <S%H4399><s%> of the place most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>, and to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>, according to all that Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%>.
And these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>; Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Abishua <S%H50><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Bukki <S%H1231><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Uzzi <S%H5813><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Zerahiah <S%H2228><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Meraioth <S%H4812><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Amariah <S%H568><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Ahitub <S%H285><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Zadok <S%H6659><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

Now these are their dwelling places <S%H4186><s%> throughout their castles <S%H2918><s%> in their coasts <S%H1366><s%>, of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>: for theirs was the lot <S%H1486><s%>.
And they gave <S%H5414><s%> them Hebron <S%H2275><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%> it.
But the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and the villages <S%H2691><s%> thereof, they gave <S%H5414><s%> to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>.

And to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, namely, Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, the city of refuge <S%H4733><s%>, and Libnah <S%H3841><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Jattir <S%H3492><s%>, and Eshtemoa <S%H851><s%>, with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
And Hilen <S%H2432><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Debir <S%H1688><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Hilen: or, Holon
And Ashan <S%H6228><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Bethshemesh <S%H1053><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>: Ashan: or, Ain

And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>; Geba <S%H1387><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Alemeth <S%H5964><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>. All their cities <S%H5892><s%> throughout their families <S%H4940><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>. Alemeth: or, Almon

And unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, which were left <S%H3498><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of that tribe <S%H4294><s%>, were cities given out of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%>, namely, out of the half <S%H4276><s%> tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, by lot <S%H1486><s%>, ten <S%H6235><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%> throughout their families <S%H4940><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

Unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> were given by lot <S%H1486><s%>, throughout their families <S%H4940><s%>, out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%>, which are called <S%H7121><s%> by their names <S%H8034><s%>.

And the residue of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> had cities <S%H5892><s%> of their coasts <S%H1366><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> unto them, of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%>, Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; they gave also Gezer <S%H1507><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
And Jokmeam <S%H3361><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Bethhoron <S%H1032><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
And Aijalon <S%H357><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Gathrimmon <S%H1667><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>:

And out of the half <S%H4276><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>; Aner <S%H6063><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Bileam <S%H1109><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, for the family <S%H4940><s%> of the remnant <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>.

Unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%> were given out of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>:
And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>; Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Daberath <S%H1705><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
And Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Anem <S%H6046><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>:
And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>; Mashal <S%H4913><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Abdon <S%H5658><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
And Hukok <S%H2712><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Rehob <S%H7340><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>:

And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>; Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Hammon <S%H2540><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Kirjathaim <S%H7156><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.

Unto the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> were given out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, Rimmon <S%H7417><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Tabor <S%H8396><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>:

And on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> by Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, on the east side <S%H4217><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, were given them out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Bezer <S%H1221><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Jahzah <S%H3096><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> also with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Mephaath <S%H4158><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>:
And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>; Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
And Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Jazer <S%H3270><s%> with her suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.
